PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DistributionPortCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Common attributes attached to an instance of IfcDistributionPort.

PropertyDef.Name: PortNumber
PropertyDef.Definition: The port index for logically ordering the port within the containing element or element type.

PropertyDef.Name: ColourCode
PropertyDef.Definition: Name of a colour for identifying the connector, if applicable.
